title: AI for Climate Change: Supporting Sustainable Solutions
problem_statement: Climate change is one of the biggest global challenges. Artificial Intelligence (AI) can help track environmental changes, predict climate patterns, and suggest better energy usage. Still, lack of resources, data gaps, and high costs slow down its use. This research looks at how AI can support climate action in simple, practical ways.
key_questions: How can AI help in predicting and reducing the impact of climate change?
What are the main challenges in applying AI to environmental problems?
Which real-world projects show the best examples of AI for sustainability?
method_brief: Study research papers and reports on AI in climate change from 2015â€“2025.
Review examples where AI is used in agriculture, weather forecasting, and renewable energy.
Interview experts in climate science and AI technology.
Compare benefits and challenges of AI projects in both developed and developing countries.
deliverables: A short research report (15 pages) highlighting uses and challenges of AI in climate action.
Case studies of successful AI projects for the environment.
Practical recommendations for governments, NGOs, and companies.
